term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - polymerase chain reaction (PCR)
term.title: polymerase chain reaction

item.text: A laboratory technique to rapidly amplify pre-determined regions of double-stranded DNA. Generally involves the use of a heat-stableDNA polymerase.

sources.item: PAC, 1997, 69, 1251. 'Glossary of terms used in bioinorganic chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1997)' on page 1293 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199769061251)
